description:
Download the DLC "TAITO LEGACY" from the Limited Edition Pack and get access to 3 Exclusive TAITO Classic Skin Backgrounds from iconic franchises, including:

CHACK'N POP 
OPERATION WOLF 
THE FAIRYLAND STORY

Customize your online backgrounds during PvP matches against your opponents and get a little piece of History!
name: ARKANOID - ETERNAL BATTLE - LIMITED EDITION PACK - TAITO LEGACY
